Package net.sourceforge.cilib.Algorithm

Interface Summary
AlgorithmFactory A factory used to produce an Algorithm must satisfy this interface.
AlgorithmListener Any class can implement this interface to be notified about algorithm events.
GradientOptimisationAlgorithm  
OptimisationAlgorithm Any algorithm that implements this interface can be used to solve an OptimisationProblem.
ParticipatingAlgorithm Any algorithm that implements this interface can be used as a participant in a CoOperativeOptimisationAlgorithm.
 

Class Summary
Algorithm All algorithms in CILib should be subclasses of Algorithm.
AlgorithmEvent This is the event raised by algorithms after iterations and completion.
CoOperativeOptimisationAlgorithm This abstract class forms that basis for any Co-Operative Optimisation implementations.
MultistartOptimisationAlgorithm MultistartOptimisationAlgorithm is simply a wrapper.
SplitCoOperativeOptimisationAlgorithm This class implements a generalised co-operative optimisation algorithm.
SUCOOptimisationAlgorithm Selective Update Co-Operative Optimisation Algorithm.
 

Exception Summary
InitialisationException This exception is thrown whenever an algorithm is run without being properly initialised.
